1.title: Who are you?

11.content: You are a teleporter, although you are less limited than Nightcrawler. You do not need to be able to see where your going, you just need to imagine the place where you need to go. If you have never been to a place before, and you think about it, an image of the place comes into your head, so you can teleport there, this also helps as it is a current image, so you can see guards, weapons and anything that might be there. Your story starts as you are walking home from school. You see that your way is blocked up ahead by a boy in a blue costume. "Are you Nathan?" said the boy. You nodded. "Pietro Maximoff" he said, holding out his hand "We would like you to come and join our group, we believe your teleporting abilities will be a considerable asset" You took his hand and shook it. "What is your group called?"

13.content: You were sitting in the lunch hall at school. Not really the place you want to be when a food fight starts. As a burger came flying towards you, you put your hands above your head to protect yourself. The burger stopped in mid air, and fell to the ground. You quickly ran out of the hall, unable to process what you had just seen. You ran out into the playground, the December snow crunching under your feet. You ran into a woman with silver hair. "I am Ororo Monroe" she said "You better come with me"
13.title: Create forcefields around anyone

You run after the fur man, you're not done with him yet

They came to a place where it seemed to be fried by the sun. You and Ororo come out of the car and run towards the enemy. A man in furs ran at you. he was hit by a beam of red light. You looked around. You saw a man with glasses on. You look towards the truck and see that there is a girl trapped there. There is also a man with claws fighting the man with furs. You ran over to the truck and quickly tried the door. It was locked. You quickly remembered your forcefield. You made a small one expand inside the lock. The lock broke. You opened the door. You realised why the girl hadn't moved. There was a small fire in front of her. You quickly created a forcefield around the fire. "Come on" you say to the girl. "I'm stuck" she said. You noticed that her seatbelt was trapping her. You expanded a forcefield inside her seatbelt and broke it open. "Come on" you say, offering her your hand. She took it. It was then that you realised that she was wearing leather gloves. It was to be expected since it was the middle of winter. She jumps out of the truck.You look around, only to see the fur man running off into the distance.

The man with claws had been knocked unconscious, but his tags said his name was Logan. You turned the tag over. On the other side it said Wolverine. The girl had introduced herself as Marie. But Marie called herself Rogue all the time. Logan was still unconscious. A man with goggles on came out and helped carry Logan in. You and Rogue went inside. A man in a wheelchair came over to you.l "I am professer Xavier" he said "I have been expecting you both" "Will you be teaching us?" you asked him "I will be teahing you some times, but i will leave most of your teaching up to Ororo here, also known as Storm" he replied. "When do we start?" you ask.
1321.title: You go to the school now

13211.content: "Your first class is with me" said the professer. You and Rogue walked along the corridor with him. "What are we going to be learning about?" you ask "I feel that a theoretical knowledge of evolution will help you to understand why you have these powers" "O.K" you say. You had reached the classroom. You sit down next to Rogue and the lesson began. The professer taught the lesson and you started to understand about original theory of evolution and of Darwin's theory of natural selection and he said that this was natural selection among humans. This was what these mutations were.

The others introduced themselves as Bobby or Iceman, and Johnny or Pyro. "Why do you all have names and names equivalent to your powers?" you asked. "We just sort of choose them" said Bobby "I never thought about it" "I don't know what name i could have" you say "I mean, i create forcefields, there are no cool names for that" The other three frowned, thinking about what name you could have.

You pulled up your hood and followed her onto the bus, sitting down two rows behind her. You watched her get off the bus at the train station. You followed her onto the train. You thought that this would be the best time to reveal yourself. You walked over to her and sat down next to her. "Marie, what are you doing running away like that" you said. She jumped. "Nathan" she said "What are you doing here?" "Well" you said, wondering wether to tell her the truth "I had a dream during the night that you and me were at the train station and you were kidnapped, so naturally, i came to protect you"

1321112122112.title: You get another vision

"You alright" he said "I thought the professer was mad at me" she said "Who told you that?" asked Logan "A boy at school" she replied. "I saw you, that wasn't Bobby, that was a shapeshifter" you said "I saw his eyes change colour" "So, someone wanted to get me out of the way?" said Rogue "Why?" Suddenly, the front of the train separated out and the guy in the goofy helmet from your vision came in. You watched as the guy held up his hand and Logan froze. You quickly put your own hand up, pointing at him, just as he threw Logan backwards, he controlled metal. You quickly expanded a forcefield around him, cutting off his powers.
13211121221121.title: Stay where you are

You noticed the man in furs from before come and grab Rogue. You quickly jumped out of the train after Rogue. Suddenly, the strange toad man attacked you again, tripping you up. You expanded a forcefield around him so as to trap him and concentrated on keeping him trapped. Then, suddenly, something slammed into you, Afer a second, you realised it was Logan. After another second, he was up again. You quickly expanded a forcefield around Logan for a minute so you could heal. He noticed it was a strange, dark green. A woman with red hair came in and fixed the poisoned Cerebro as the professer called it. She soon had it back to normal. "Can we find Rogue now?" you asked, you really hoped this machine wasn't just for show.
1321112122112121.title: You get back in time

"Nathan" said the Professer's voice in your head "You should call yourself Void while out fighting Magneto" he said out loud "Void?" you asked "Why?" "You stop powers from working inside the forcefield" said the Professer "You also take in all powers" Then he said to Logan "You can't stop Magneto alone" "I know" he said "I won't be alone" and he looked at you. "I think I know what Magneto's plan is" said the Professer "He has created a machine to turn the world into mutants, but the machine is unstable and it will kill people, it nearly killed him when he used it last" "Then we have to hurry" you say "You and my team can take the jet" said the Professer "Lets go get them and go" you said "We don't have much time" Suddenly, you weren't looking at the professer anymore. 13211121221121211.title: The Professer finds Rogue

"Allow me" you said, having done some mechanics in school, you grabbed a spanner from outside the jet and pulled a mobile phone equipped with a scanner from your pocket. You watched as her eyes turned red and the panel came off. You quickly removed something from the panel. "This ship has been tampered with" you said. The panel dropped to the ground. "Tampered with?" asked Jean "See this?" you said "If you had tried to take off with this in here, the whole thing would have exploded" "Will the jet start now?" she asked "Why don't you try it?" you said. You and Jean went inside the jet and Jean tried to start it again. The jet roared into life. "Thanks Nathan" said Jean

Jean was standing over you. "Ah, you're awake" she said, looking relieved. "Did we win?" you asked. "Yes" said Jean "We won" You sat up, slowly. "How's Rogue doing?" you asked. "She's fine" said Jean. Suddenly, you accidently expanded your forcefield, gaining Jean's power temporarily. You found out Rogue was fine as Jean had said, as was everyone else. "Can I go back to my room?" you ask. "Yeah" she said "You seem to be fully healed, did you happen to absorb Logan's healing capability?" "Yeah" you say "At the train station" "I need to go and see Rogue" you say. You walked out of the room and back to the mansion. You quickly found Rogue. She was sitting on her bed, laughing. You saw Bobby, who seemed to just have finished telling a really funny joke and was now laughing along with Rogue. You smiled. "Hey Rogue" you say. She jumped. "Nathan!" she shouted, running up and throwing her arms around you. You expanded your forcefield just in time. Then, you hugged her back. "Thank god your alright" Rogue continued. "Wanna go for a walk in the garden?" you asked her, but directing your question at both Bobby and Rogue.
132111212211212111112111.title: You recover the next day

"I think it's a great idea" said Xavier "Here' i've been saving these for you" He opened a panel in the wall to reveal three costumes, similar to the X Men's costumes. After both Bobby and Marie had packed, you went to the games room with your backpacks packed with everything you'd need. "We're going to do some exploring of New York, we'll be gone for a month or two" You say. Everyone in the games room crowded round, saying their goodbyes. They left the mansion and set off down the road, backpacks over their shoulders.
1321112122112121111121111.title: I'm leaving

13211121221121211111211111.content: You, Bobby and Marie found a hotel in the center of New York. After staying there for two nights, you heard a commotion a few blocks away. You and Marie and Bobby quickly changed into your costumes and ran to the scene. A giant green alien thing was attacking three humans and a giant, orange rock monster. "It's the Fantastic Four" you say. The green thing heard you and turned. You did not recognise it. It had yellow eyes and both of it's arms were encased in fire and was rocky like the Thing. Then the green thing threw a punch, and his fist stretched like Mr Fantastic. The three of you jumped out of the way and Iceman shot ice at the arm, freezing it to the ground. You expanded a forcefield around the green monster and Rogue ran towards it. You took away the forcefield as she reached it. She picked it up and threw it into the wall. Meanwhile, the Fantastic Four were staring on in amazement. The green thing was knocked unconscious. You and Iceman and Rogue ran over to the Fantastic Four. "Hey, what was that thing?" asked Rogue. The Fantastic Four were still a bit shell shocked from your appearance. You decided introductions were in order. "I'm Nathan aka Void, This is Bobby aka Iceman and this is Marie aka Rogue, we're from Xavier's school for the gifted" "I'm Reed Richards" said the tallest of the Fantastic Four "Or Mr Fantastic, This is Suzan Storm, or the Invisible Woman and this is Ben Grimm,or The Thing and Johnny Storm, or the Human Torch" "Nice to meet you" said Rogue "What was that thing?" "A Super Skrull" said Reed "One of the alien race known as the Skrulls, genetically engineered to have all of the Fantastic Four's powers" "Hey" said Johnny "You seem like some pretty cool guys, no pun intended Iceman, so would you like to stay with us for a while?" Do you agree to stay with the Fantastic Four?

"Yes" said Sue "But I don't take on others powers" "What about the rest of you?" you ask. "I can expand any part of my anatomy" said Reed. "I'm strong and I have really hard skin" said Ben. "No kidding" you say, looking at his rock skin. "I can heat up to an unknown level of heat" shouted Johnny, obviously listening in on the conversation. They had reached the Fantastic Four's appartment.

It split into three and then formed into three beds. You looked at Reed, questioningly. "Programmable matter" he said "Similar to what we used to make our costumes" "That stuff is so cool" said Bobby, relaxing on his bed. You sat down on yours. You brought out some paper and began to draw something. Marie looked at what you were drawing. It was pictures of the Fantastic Four along with the three of them in costume. The drawings were really good and Marie said so. You thanked her. You then drew the Super Skrull along with a profile of it's strengths and weaknesses. "What are you doing?" asked Reed. "I thought that if the X Men had to face the Super Skrull, I should try and write down it's strengths and weaknesses" you said. "We should stay with you longer" you say "I would like to try and find out more about your enemies, by the way, what are the Super Skrulls weaknesses?" "Well, his powers are dependant on cosmic energy leaking through the atmosphere" said Reed "But if he's hit by the Skrullian power beam, he is a lot more powerful than us, if not, he's only half as powerful" "I take it when we fought him, he was only half power" you say. "Yes" said Reed

Marie decided to stay with Sue and maybe do some shopping. After three hours of endless gaming, Johnny suggested they come to the Baxter Building dojo. They agreed. Bobby wanted to have a power battle with the torch, see which power is better. What do they do first?
13211121221121211111211111121.title: The next morning

Up until now, you had only ever used your powers for defensive methods -Except for copying other mutants powers- and Sue was going to show you some offensive methods of forcefield projection. "When forming your field, just form a point in front of you" said Sue. You conccentrated and an arrow seemed to appear. "Good" she said "Now aim it at the practice dummy" You aimed it at the dummy. The dummy was destroyed. "You can also use a forcefield under your feet to fly up into the air" said Sue, demonstrating. You created it as Sue said and floated up into the air, standing on the forcefield platform. After flying around for a while, you went back to the ground. Johnny congratulated you. Reed patted you on the back from across the other side of the room. The smiles of everyone in the room faded as an alarm sounded. "What is it Reed?" asked Sue. "I don't know, it's some kind of magnetic interference" he said. "Did you say magnetic?" you asked. Reed nodded. You exchanged fearful looks with Bobby and Marie. "What is it?" asked Johnny, picking up on their fear. "It's Magneto" said Bobby "We fought him before we left" "He must be back for revenge" you said "We need to contact the X Men" "Bobby, can you get there" said Reed. "Not for a few days" said Bobby "Can we get through this magnetic interference?" "We can try" said Reed "Hey, where's Johnny" Everyone looked around. You ran to the window. The Human torch was blazing into the distance. You still had the power from the Super Skrull. "I still have Johnny's power from Super Skrull, I can fly to Xavier's school and get help" you say

They looked at each other. "We don't know" said Reed. "We're running out of time" said Bobby "You need to get to the X Men" "Did Johnny have a catch phrase, or something" you asked. "Flame on" said Reed. "Flame on" you said. Your body engulfed in flame. You flew out of the window and into the air. Then, your flame went and you fell. Then it came on again. Relieved, you continued flying. Eventually you reached Xavier's school. You touched down on the lawn where Jean was standing. Jean had her mouth open, staring in awe at you. "Get the others, Magneto is back" you said. Jean ran inside. Soon, The X Jet was in the air along with you flying alongside it. You waved at them to follow you and flew back to the Baxter Building. "Reed, you got a hangar" you said to Reed over the communicator that they had given you. "Yeah" he said. You watched as a door opened. You flew inside, extinguished your flame and ran to the side to make way for the X Jet. The Reed, Sue and Ben and the X Men met for the first time. "Magneto's coming" you said "I don't know how he got out of his prison but he's coming" "How do you know this?" asked Jean. "Magnetic interference in the Fantastic Four's headquarters" you said. "We think he might have allied with our old enemy Doctor Doom" said Reed "The Human Torch has gone off to stop them on his own" "We need to go" you say "Does the Torch have a tracking device on him?" "Yes" said Reed. "Lets go" said Xavier "My jet is larger, we should take that"
1321112122112121111121111112111.title: They agree

13211121221121211111211111121112.content: You soon find Magneto's location and land in a forest. You and Johnny took point , getting ready for the attack. Bobby was right behind you to provide cover. The rest of them fanned out behind them. You put up your hand, signalling them to stop. You moved forward. Suddenly, several identical men attacked from all sides. You used Johnny's power to take several of them out. Looking around, you watched your companions take out the rest of the men and one of them fell to the ground and didn't vanish. "Looks like we defeated him" you say "Who was it?" "Multiple man" said Xavier "I saw him on Cerebro before we left" "Lets keep going" you say "If Multiple Man is here, we need to be on our guard, Magneto already knows we're here, be on your guard" You flew into the air to look for Magneto. You saw him in a clearing ahead. He was surrounded by several people including two of the people you had fought before on Liberty Island. Also there was a woman in red and a guy in a blue costume. There was a large man in a brown suit and a very fat, large man. There was also a man in a green cloak and a strange, silver face. After going down, you told the X Men and the Fantastic Four what you had seen. The X Men knew most of the villians Magneto had gathered. They didn't know the green cloaked one. The Fantastic Four did, however. "It's Doctor Doom" said Reed "He's our oldest enemy, he can shoot lightning, we barely defeated him last time" "Well, you have help this time" came a new voice. Everyone looked around to see a guy in yellow and red armour. Behind him was a guy in American colours, a guy in a red costume and a silver helmet, a girl in yellow with wings, a guy in black, a guy dressed as Thor and a guy in pink, carrying a bow. "Iron Man" he introduced himself "Myself and the Avengers are here to take them down, two of our number, Quicksilver and the Scarlet Witch are already in the enemy camp" "Which ones are they?" you asked. "The one in the blue and the one in the red" said the guy in American wear "Captain America" he said. The rest of the Avengers introduced themselves. "With all of us together, they won't be able to stop us" you said
13211121221121211111211111121112.title: Multiple Man

132111212211212111112111111211121.title: The Battle

1321112122112121111121111112111212.content: "You know, i've just realised something" you said, as the Avengers, X Men and Fantastic Four set out numerous tables and chairs in one of the rooms of the Avengers Mansion. "What did you realise?" asked Maria. "This is probably the biggest gathering of super heroes in all of recorded history" you reply "Magneto's war on humanity has been avoided, for now" "What will you do now?" asked Maria. "Thanks for the offer, but I think i'll return to the X Men now" said Rogue "Me and Bobby have been running round after you for a while, and it's been fun, but now i'd like to return to some measure of reality" "That's cool, i'll see you when I return to the X Men" you say. "You'll come back then?" said Rogue. "Of course i'll come back" you say "My best friends are there" Rogue smiled. "Let's not talk about that now" you say "Let's enjoy this party"
1321112122112121111121111112111212.title: Celebrating with all three teams

13211121221121211111211111121112121.content: You almost laughed as you saw all the different super heroes dancing. You saw Reed Richards, on his own dance floor, throwing his arms all over the place. You saw Bobby freezing the air over the glasses, causing ice to rain down into the cups. You watched Tony Stark throwing bottles into the air and shooting them. As one arcs towards you, you put a forcefield around the bottle. The blast is deflected into the ground and you catch the bottle. As you are about to drink it, the bottle flies out of your hand and into Jeans, across the other side of the room. "Your too young to drink, Nathan" said Jean, placing the bottle on the table. Several of the assembled heroes chuckled at this. You shrugged and went to grab some food from the food table. "You are truly a force to be reckoned with, young Nathan" said a voice from behind you. You looked around. A man with a red cloak and a hammer at his belt was standing behind you. "Your Thor, right?" you say "Your one of the Avengers heavy hitters" "Correct" said Thor "I have heard that you will be temporarily joining the Avengers" "You've heard right" you say "The X Men are feared and hated, just a few months separate from the X Men has shown me that, while separate from the X Men, people don't see me as a mutant, but as a hero" "You have a good heart, Nathan" said Thor "The Avengers will be lucky to have you, if we're not disbanded by SHIELD, that is, Maria Hill has been trying to get us working for SHIELD for years" You turned to watch as Wolverine, unable to open a bottle of beer, slashes it off with one of his claws. Both you and Thor laughed. "Some people just have no patience" you say. "You think he's impatient?" asked Thor "Try getting the Hulk on a bad day" You tried to think of a retort to this, then realised Thor was probably right. "Good point" you say. You then went back to mingling with the other heroes. Looking over to where The Human Torch and Hawkeye were arguing. It looked like they were about to fight. Although you were curious about how that fight might turn out, you decided that a party was the wrong place to do it. You quickly stepped between them and put a separate forcefield around each of them. "Enough, guys" you say "You can tear each other apart in the dojo later, but for now, drop it" Hawkeye lowered his fists and so did The Human Torch. You lowered the forcefields. You glared at both of them. They turned their backs on each other and went off in opposite directions. "It's normally me who has to be peacekeeper" said Sue. "It helps that my forcefields negate their powers" you say, shrugging "Also, check this out" You hold out your right hand and a fireball appears in it. "You got Johnny's powers?" said Sue. "It's temporary, twenty four hours, at a rough estimate for how long I kept the forcefield up" you explain

13211121221121211111211111121112121211.title: Yes

132111212211212111112111111211121212111.content:
The party continued late into the night, at about 11, you got tired and asked Hank Pym where you could go and retire for the night. He showed you to your room, then returned to the party. The next morning, you woke up and went to the party room. You found Iron Man slumped against the wall in his armor.
"Jarvis, wake up Tony will you?" you say calmly.
"Activating Iron Man suit alarm clock," said Jarvis.
A shrill beeping sounded in Tony's helmet. He groaned, then released his helmet.
"Uhh, Morning Nathan," said Tony
"So, who's idea was it to put an alarm clock in the Iron Man suit, anyway?" you asked
"Jarvis installed it without my knowledge, he thought it might be useful for if anyone manages to mind control me," said Tony, standing up, still in the suit "Jarvis, did you let me sleep in this?"
"You were hardly in a condition to take it off last night, sir," replied Jarvis "Nick Fury of SHIELD called, he needs the Avengers help"
"Tell him we'll be there at around 4, we need to train as a team with a new member," said Tony "And get Void an ID card"
Tony led the way down to the basement, into what looked like a conference room with a holographic table in the middle. A small card was in a slot to the side of the table. Tony took it out and gave it to you. "Welcome to the Avengers, Void," he said
132111212211212111112111111211121212111.title: The next day

1321112122112121111121111112111212121111.content:
It was the third super hero training room you had been in, and every one had been different. The X Men's Danger Room would create simulated battle scenarios that the teams would then take down. The Fantastic Four's training room looked more like a dojo. The Avengers was a room with high walls covered with rocket launchers and there were tracks along the floor to show where saw blades could come out. Laser sights roved the room from the ceiling. Tony Stark's voice came over the comm in the room.
"You ready?" You nodded.
"Jarvis, run the room on level 1,"
A laser shot towards you from the ceiling. You threw a small force field ball at the laser. Propelling it with your powers, you sent it through the laser, scattering the energy to either side. The ball hit the laser gun that had fired it, rendering it inoperable. Two rocket launchers at opposite sides of the room fired at you. You put a force field around one of the rockets and threw it into the other one, blowing them both up. Three lasers on the roof fired towards you. You put up your main force field. All three lasers converged on the force field. You concentrated, lifting the force field up into the air with you still standing inside it. As before, you pushed against the lasers with your force field, soon reaching the guns. You reached up and pulled the mounted gun out of it's housing. Since it was still firing, you put a smaller force field around it, stopping the laser from firing temporarily. Once you had the gun, you turned it on the rocket launchers, bringing the gun in a circle, destroying all of them. You used force fields to wrench the rest of the laser guns from their sockets, destroying them with the gun you still held. You then dropped back down to the ground.
"End simulation," said Jarvis's voice, the doors opened, and you entered the control room, where the rest of the Avengers were staring at the video of you, just ending.
"So, how did I do?" you asked

How do the Avengers react?
1321112122112121111121111112111212121111.title: Training

1321112122112121111121111112111212121111.content:
"Well," said Tony "You destroyed every single weapon in the room, it'll take me a while to replace those, but since your objective was to defend yourself, i'd say you did well."
"How are we gonna train now?" asked Janet, looking at a computer system which showed that all the weapons in the room were destroyed.
"How did you train with the X Men, Nathan?" asked Steve
"Well, we mostly trained in our training room, the Danger Room, but it was frequently destroyed, so we did a lot of one on one sparring," you explained "We were normally paired with whoever would present the hardest challenge to beat."
"Like this," said Hulk "Who do I get to smash first?"
"Actually, Hulk," you say "I can't think of anyone who might be able to beat you except myself or Thor, but you would pose a challenge to the others."
That seemed to surprise the others. "You think you can beat Hulk?" asked Clint
"I heard that you and Natasha took him down in Nevada," you say "Why is it so hard to believe that I can't take him down?"
"This i'd like to see," said Clint "How about you demonstrate your sparring match idea by fighting Hulk?"
"I don't think that's a good idea," said Janet "The kid could get hurt."
"Hey, i'm right here," you said indignantly "I wouldn't have suggested it if I wasn't a match for him, the purpose of sparring is to get you thinking about strategy."
"I would vote against it too," said Natasha "I don't think SHIELD would allow Hulk more freedom if he kills or seriously injures a kid."
"I'm for it," said Hulk "You're gonna get smashed, X man."
"I vote for it, too," said Tony "I've not seen anyone who is a match for the Hulk on their own, except maybe another Gamma villian."
"You are indeed brave young Nathan," said Thor "But I cannot allow this fight to happen, I vote against."
Black Panther then voted in support of the sparring match, but Hank Pym voted against it, leaving the final decision up to Clint Barton, aka Hawkeye.
1321112122112121111121111112111212121111.title: Amazed

choices: Everyone wants to spar with you or Hulk
No one wants to spar with you or Hulk
1321112122112121111121111112111212121111.content:
"Hey, if the kid says he can do it, I say give him a shot," said Clint, shrugging "I'd also like to see how good you really are, Nathan."
"Shall we go outside then?" you asked "We can spar in the garden at the back of the mansion."
The Avengers watched as Hulk charged at Nathan, letting out a roar. He slammed into Nathan's forcefield and fell to the ground. He was up again in a second and started pummeling the forcefield. This went on for some time, and huge amounts of dust was thrown up. As Hulk stopped punching the forcefield, panting, you ran towards him, shutting off your force field and putting it around both of you. You punched Hulk hard and he went flying, hitting the side of the forcefield head first.
"Your powers are flipped in here, Hulk," you say "The angrier you get in here, the weaker you become." You picked him up again and again threw him against the forcefield wall "Do you understand now, Hulk, how I was planning to beat you." You held out your hand to Hulk on the ground. Hulk seemed to become less angry, and held out his hand. You pulled him to his feet.
The dust had cleared. You deactivated your forcefield. "Thank you for the sparring match, Hulk," you say, shaking his hand "Remember that tactical thinking can beat a mind clouded by rage."
Hulk bowed his head. "You win, Nathan," he said "Until next time?"
"Until next time," you say "Now, how about we challenge the others to a sparring match then?"

1321112122112121111121111112111212121111.content:
"If I might interrupt, Avengers," said Jarvis "It appears that Living Laser, Vapor and Vector are attacking Stark Tower."
"We'll finish this later," said Tony "To the Quinjet."
Having suited up for training, none of the Avengers needed to get into costume. They all headed for the Quinjet.
"Have you faced any of these villians before?" you asked, having heard of none of them.
"Vapor and Vector are U Foes," said Hawkeye "They're powers come from technology."
"And Living Laser?" you asked
"He's a being of pure energy, he's the most powerful living weapon around, unless you count Iron Man," explained Black Widow "They were all locked in the Cube before the breakout."
"I take it that's not the same as the game show?" you asked. The Avengers laughed.
"Not quite the same," said Ant Man "It's a prison for villians created by Gama radiation."
The Quinjet landed on the ground in front of Stark Tower. A strange, green gas obscured everything.
"Jarvis, keep the engines running, it should give us a free space where Vapor won't be able to get us," said Tony
"How do you fight a villian made of gas?" you asked "None of your weapons look like they would work very well, perhaps we need to go buy a vacuum cleaner."
"Afraid not," said Captain America "We tried that once, she broke out of it, we need a far bigger containment unit to keep her contained, these villians working together, we need to defeat them in a specific order, Living Laser first, followed by Vector and then Vapor."
"Why Living Laser first?" you asked, trying to learn everything you could about the villians you were fighting.
"Vector can absorb and redirect energy," said Iron Man "If him and the Living Laser are working together, the Living Laser could power him up before the battle."
"Got it," you said "So the question is, how do we get through Vapor to kill Living Laser?"
"That's the question all right," said Captain America "You got any ideas?"

"Just one," you say "I can trap some clean air in this force field, and it should act as a filter, which brings in clean air while keeping Vapor out, once we get to the building, we'll need to turn on the air conditioning on high, that should keep Vapor from staying a gas, she'll have to change back to her solid form, then, she's no longer our problem until we defeat Living Laser."
"It's a good plan," said Cap "But it leaves a lot to chance."
"Don't all plans?" you asked "No plan is full proof, there are always too many variables for everything to always work out exactly as planned."
"Void's right," said Iron Man "It's the best plan we've got, we've got no time to make another one."
You led the Avengers out of the jet, putting up a force field before you left, expanding it as each Avenger came out, keeping them all inside the force field. They walked forward, the gas pressing down on them, looking for an opening. Then, when it couldn't, a female face swirled out of the green mist.
"Why not put down the force field," she said in a sweet, gentle voice "I just want to look upon you handsome boy."
"Really?" you say "You're flirting with a kid, get a life." You then expanded the force field, forcing the gas into a much smaller space, above them, even above the air vents.
"Right," you say "Wasp, get to the control room and turn on the air conditioning, i'm not sure how much longer i'll be able to keep her contained." As you said it, you felt a huge pressure on the top of the force field. Looking up, you saw that Vapor had turned into explosive gas and tried to blow her way out of the force field. However, all the energy was absorbed.
"I'll be able to use that later," you say "Thank you Vapor."
She seemed to realize she wasn't going to get out, and returned to her human form. You deactivated your first force field and trapped her in another.
"Another one for 42 then," said Ant Man "We'll have filled a few more cells by tonight."
Vapor laughed. "You think you've won?" said Vapor "I was just the distraction, once we have the energy of your Arc Reactor, Living Laser and Vector can level New York, block by block."
"We need to go," said Iron Man, a sense of urgency in his voice "Nathan, can you keep Vapor contained?"
"Sure," you say "Go ahead."
1321112122112121111121111112111212121111.title: You have an idea

1321112122112121111121111112111212121111.content:
You sat down on the floor, to wait for the Avengers to return. Vapor sat cross-legged on the ground, trying to summon explosive gas to blast her way out, but nothing happened.
"You may as well stop trying," you said "Your not getting out of there."
"I've never been human this long," said Vapor "Ever since I became a U-foe, I've only been able to be in my human form for very brief periods."
"Why did you turn to criminality?" you asked "I read your file, your a very gifted engineer, your brilliant at physics, and you choose to use those powers for evil."
"I can only be human for very brief periods," said Vapor "I'm an outcast, a freak, I'd never be accepted in the real world, so I guess I turned against the world."
"You don't need to turn against the world," you say "I know exactly how you feel, Vapor, I used to feel the same way, you see, I'm a mutant, all mutants are constantly prosecuted for being who they are, but we use our powers to protect humanity, you aren't a mutant, Vapor, but you're in the same situation as the other mutants out there, and I know that you would be accepted if you went to Xavier's School."
"You really think they'd accept me?" asked Vapor, hopefully, her green eyes sparkling.
"I do," you said "And I think the Avengers would agree, if I asked them."
"Keep the force field up," said Vapor "I want to stay human, if you take it down, I'll be forced back into my gas form."

It wasn't long after that, that Wasp came to tell you that the Avengers had been victorious. Vector and Living Laser were all taken to the prison called 42.
"I'd like to take Vapor back to the X Mansion," you say "She's expressed a desire to change, to become a better person, if you will, I would like to take her back and give her that chance."
"We'd need to send one of our people back with her to watch over her," said Iron Man "In case she's lying."
"I can watch her," you say "And I think the X Men can handle her if she goes rogue."
"Good luck then," said Iron Man "We'll give you, and her, a lift back in the morning."
You led Vapor back into the jet and sat down, with her still in the force field.
"I'm giving you a chance, Vapor," you said "A chance to change, to redeem yourself, because I have a good feeling about you, if you break my trust in you, I will hunt you down and drag you to 42 myself."
"I understand," said Vapor "And Void, call me Ann, my name is Ann Darnell."
"My name's Nathan," you said back "We'll head to the school tomorrow."

"Who the heck are you?" you blurt out. She may be a stunningly beautiful woman but you still don't know her from Eve.

"There's no time to explain." she insists, "You're in danger here."

She reaches out a hand toward you but, before you can react, something long and fleshy wraps itself tightly around her neck. Glancing behind her, you see a gruesome little man crouched low and, it can't be, but it appears his tongue has ensnared the woman before you.

'Mutant!' your brain screams inside your hed. You've seen them on the news but never been close to one... that you know of.

"Danger?" a deep, baritone voice inquires from above, "Nathan has nothing to fear from us, Ms. Munro... provided he chooses to side with his fellow Homo Superior, that is."

Your eyes travel skyward and there, floating down like some dark angel, you see a man dressed in a red costume with purple trimmings, wearing a matching helm of polishged metal. You've seen him on the news too. Magneto!

"Well, you could go off on your own, you could go and join Magneto"-her facial expression showed her discontent at this option- "Or you could come with me and meet Xavier"

You get on the jet.

The girl fell asleep.

She bared her teeth at you and snarled. "Look, I know how you feel" you say "We're both mutants trying to make out an existence for ourselves, but killing people is the wrong way about it, especially Charles Xavier" "This guy is Charles Xavier?" she said "I was just told to kill him, no questions asked" "Who asked you to kill him" you asked. She sighed "I was made for a special ops organisation under the name of HYDRA, they were trying to duplicate the adamantium bonding process that was once successful on another" she continued "I am the twenty third try, so they called me X-23, killing is the only thing i've ever known" You felt a sense of pity for the girl. "Mutant powers should not be used to kill" you say "Why don't you come to Xavier's school for the Gifted and be accepted for your powers" you say. Does she agree to go?

X-23 says laughing, before hopping off the desk and walking over to you.

141312211111.title: Mutant powers

1413122111111.content: The desks were next to each other. They looked like ordinary desks, but the first thing you noticed was that they were spotless. There was not a single mark on them. You remembered the damage you had done to your room in the orphanage, and wondered just how they managed to keep the desks so clean and tidy, with twenty or more mutants using their powers in the room. You sat down. X 23 sat in the chair next to you. Professor Munroe turned to the board and started to write something. You spent most of the rest of the day learning about the campaign for mutant rights and how two diffferent groups had very different ideas about how to do it. It reminded you of the campaign for civil rights for black Americans in the late 1940's. What are you doing next?
1413122111111.title: Together

14131221111112.content: You went to the games room. In there was a metal chair. You put out your hand. The chair came over to you and you sat down. As you sat down, you became aware that the room, which had been noisy a minute ago, had gone deathly quiet. The next thing you noticed that everyone was looking at you. They had a strange fear in their eyes. For a few moments, you sat there, feeling a bit uncomfortable at being stared at. "Wanna play table football" you asked X 23. "Yeah sure" she said, following you over to the table. Everyone in the room was still staring at the pair of you, warily. You wondered if it was because of your father. You heard the door to the games room open and the red headed girl that you saw earlier came in. She came over to the two of you. "Hey, Nathan right?" she said. "Yes" you say "I never actually asked you your name, X 23" "Laura" she said. "I'm Jean" said the red head "How are you liking the school?" You paused to spin one of the handles, sending the ball into Laura's goal. "It's great" you say "Really interesting, learning about mutants, how long have you been here?" "About three years" said Jean, looking at everyone else in the room, curiously. "You wanna go outside, we're trying to get some people together to have a game of basketball" "You up for it Laura?" you say. "Yeah" she said. You and Laura followed Jean out of the room, leaving the hundreds of eyes still staring at you behind. "Sorry about the others" said Jean "Most of them have lived in fear of Magneto and his brotherhood for some time now, and now you come in with the same powers... They think your the same as him" "How did you know that" X 23 asked. "I'm telepathic" said Jean "Are you O.K?" "I thought that since many of them have been judged because of their mutant powers, they wouldn't judge others in the same way" you said, sadly. "It's alright, me and my friends won't judge you for your powers" said Jean "In fact, we're playing mutant basketball, where we use our powers to play" You had reached the basketball court. On the court was a tall boy with red shades, a small, blue elf like thing and a girl with a ponytail. "Scot Summers" said the boy in the shades, shaking your hand. "Kurt Wagner" said the blue elf, shaking your hand as well. It was only when you looked down to shake his hand, that you noticed that he only had two fingers and a thumb. "Kitty Pryde" said the girl with the ponytail, also shaking your hand. "So, what's the teams?" you asked them. "You two get Kurt" said Scot "Me, Jean and Kitty are on the other team" The blue elf walked over to you. "What can you do?" you asked Kurt. "I can teleport" he said. "Right, lets win this thing" you said.
14131221111112.title: Leisure time (meet other students)

141312211111121.content: Laura had the ball. Scot was closing on her. She caught the ball, ready to pass. You quickly made her fly up to the basket and she threw the ball through the hoop. Scot retrieved the ball and stood behind the hoop. He passed to Jean. As the ball was in the space between Scot and Jean, Kurt appeared there and caught the ball, throwing it throught the hoop for a second time. The next time, Scot succeeded in passing the ball to Kitty, she came towards you as you prepared ot tackle her, waiting for her to swerve to either side. She didn't. she kept on running straight for you. She ran straight through you and kept going. She threw the ball through your hoop. Laura threw the ball out to you. You set off up the court. You swerved to avoid Jean, dodged a laser from Scot's eyes and threw the ball through the hoop. Kurt intercepted a pass from Scot to Kitty and then shot again. Jean put her hand out. The ball changed course and she caught it. Now, she was on the attack. She shot. Kurt teleported to catch it. The ball seemed to go around him and through the hoop. There was five minutes left. You passed the ball out to X 23 and she shot from a point that she would never score from. As the ball fell short of the hoop, Kurt appeared in the air and caught it. He shot. And scored. Your team had won. "Your pretty good" said Scot, panting "I didn't quite catch what your power was" "I can control metal" you say "Laura has an adamantium skeleton, that's what I was controlling to make her fly and score goals" "Have you ever heard of a mutant called Magneto" said Scot. You nodded "He's my father" you say "Unfortunately, most of the mutants here judged me by my fathers actions, they don't even want to know me" "Well, I think you're a great guy, Nathan" said Scot "You stick with us, the rest'll come round eventually"
141312211111121.title: Your team wins

1413122111111212.content: As you were all walking back to the games room, a window next to you smashed as a body flew through it and hit the opposite wall. It was Logan. He looked up at you. "Run!" he said, getting up and throwing himself out the window again. You realised that all your friends hadn't moved. "Are we gonna do what he says?" you asked. They all shook their heads. "Lets go help him then" you said, climbing out of the window. As you climbed out, something buried itself in the wall next to you. It was a ninja star. "Jean, can you tell how many of these ninja's there are" you asked Jean, who had climbed through the window behind you. "At least seven" said Jean. Looking around, you saw that all of your friends had come out of the building behind you. "O.K, stay close to me and get ready too take them down" you say, as the stars started flying at you. They all stopped in the air. Then, the stars went back in the direction they came. You heard cries from all directions, then several lasers came from Scot's direction. Then, Kurt vanished and you heard another cry as he kicked one of the ninjas. You heard a slash, and then silence. Kurt and Laura walked over to them. You heard a groan over to the left. You ran over to find Logan lying unconscious on the ground. As you got to him, he stirred and sat up. "What happened?" he said. "You were attacked by some sort of ninjas" you said, showing him one of the ninja stars. He examined it. "I know these stars" he said "These stars are from the ninjas that work for the Silver Samurai" "Silver Samurai?" you asked, looking around at everyone. But they all looked as confused as you were. "Who's the Silver Samurai?" asked Scot. "Do you want the long version or the short version?" said Logan

"What did they offer you?" you asked

141312211111121211111121112221.title: Wanda agrees

"Well, you can't stay cooped up in here all day," you said "I'm hungry, why don't you come with me, I'll buy you lunch."
"I don't want to hurt anyone," said Laura "It's safer if I stay here."
"But not entirely healthy," you said. Then you looked directly into the mutant assassins eyes "Do you trust me?"
"More than anyone," she said, keeping eye contact.
"I promise you, I won't let you hurt anyone," you said. Then, not breaking eye contact, you took her hand, and turned to lead her from the room.
You lead her out of the mansion and towards a nearby cafe.

"I don't like this," said Laura "This isn't right. I'm dangerous. I shouldn't be here."
"You've been robbed of too much of your childhood, Laura," you said "You need to learn how to enjoy yourself. Relax. I'm not going to let anyone get hurt, especially you."

You began to sob. "Alone again." you said.

Storm stopped walking and placed her hands onto your shoulders. "We all feel alone here, at first." she told you. "I can control the weather, summon a hurricane over a desert town." she paused. "Can you imagine how alone I felt when I first came her and met professor Xavier?"

I was stunned, and fearful. "You can control this power, right?" you asked.

Strom sighed. "I can now." she replied. "As a child, I was constantly in fear that my village would kill me every time a strong rain storm came without warning." she then smiled kindly again. "I know you are afraid but I promise you that Xavier will help you find control and a purpose."

You smiled at that. "then there is hope." you said.

"Oh, Jon, there is always hope." said Storm, walking with you again. "Never forget that."

As you continued to walk, you noticed that there were fewer and fewer 'students' running about until you saw no one. Finally, Storm stopped in front of a door. "This will be your quarters until you learn to use your powers with more control." she said. "Ironically, these were the quarters I was given my first year here."

"It was?" you asked, surprised.

Storm smiled and opened the door, pointing to a faded mark on the ceiling of the main room. "Although it had been painted over, you can still see where I had accidentally summoned lightning inside the room." she told you. "I have no doubt that you too will leave a mark of your own, to share with future students should you decide to remain as a teacher."

With that, she quietly left you to settle in. "Storm..." you called.

She stopped, turning to you. "Yes?"

You smiled. "Thank you."

Storm returned your smile. "You are welcome, Jon." she said. "Your supper will be brought to you shortly and the professor will begin your control lessons in the morning."

You watched Storm as she then left you then entered your quarters, closing the door behind you. The room looked much like any college dorm with three rooms. There was the main room where you would sleep, eat, study, and so on, there was a bathroom, and a small kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator. Walking further in, you found that all of your luggage, what there was of it, had already been moved into the room.

"Welcome home, Jon." you said to yourself, shedding a tear. "So begins my new life..."

Then, there came a knock on your door...

If Sara had not added, 'put all the cards on the table', she would have refused her. She was still uncertain why she had convinced Mystic to push you into come to Xavier's school. "Sounds good." she said. "Let's go."

A few minutes later, you and Marie were sitting inside the Xavier school common room, eating lunch. "This is not what I had imagined when you said a 'double date'." you stated.

Marie laughed. "The date is tonight, Jon." she said. "I figured we get the all cards on the table thing done now so we can genuinely enjoy ourselves later."

You nodded then turned to Sara who took a breath. "Magneto is working on a machine that, he says will turn normal humans into mutants, like us." she said. "The only problem is that it requires a lot of Magneto's power to work, if he were our age, it would not be an issue but..."

"He's getting up there." said Bobby. "So he needs someone younger who can do the job for him."

Maria gasped. "They were planning to use me in that... that thing!?!" she asked, horrified.

"They were." confirmed Sara. "I convinced Mystic to talk Jon into going to Xavier's school to buy some time, give them another target to consider, slow them down." she sighed. "I had no idea he was your long lost little brother."

Marie sighed. "I guess I owe you for that." she said.

"Quicksilver already has an idea of what he can do." mussed Bobby. "It won't take long before word gets out that he's your little bro, Marie."

"That would make him a popular boy, considering your status as the toughest girl in school, Marie." said Sara, ruefully. "Maybe we can use that to our advantage, the brotherhood will not use their powers in school, at least not openly."

Marie snapped her fingers. "We'll leak word that you two are an item." she said, surprising you and Sara. "Every boy in school is after to get a date from you, considering your power. Being his boyfriend will attract some heat but it will keep the brotherhood at bay for a while."

"By the boys, wanting to see how I did it." you said, catching on. "Somehow, I don't like this plan."

15531212212221121112221211222.title: Trouble on campus.

155312122122211211122212112221.content:
Knotting your jaws in decision, you thought about Kurt's power and them thought about the girl who had a fight with Frederick. Suddenly, as you had hoped, you heard a pop before you appeared in front of the girl. She let out a startled yelp and raised her hands as if to defend herself from you.

"I'm sorry I startled you, ma'am." you said, quickly. "I... I'm new at what I can do."

The girl relaxed slightly. "You're from Xavier's school?" she asked.

You nodded. "My given name is Neuro." you explained. "I have the ability to manipulate the nervous system of any living being, including myself." you sighed. "It gives me the power to mimic other mutant's powers for a short time... among other things."

"I see... My given name is Minx, I have the ability to warp reality in a localized area." she said, softly. "Only, in doing so, it always creates a chain reaction. I have to be very careful."

You shuddered at the thought, thinking of your own powers. "Believe me, Minx, I know the feeling all too well." you said. "I nearly made my best friend blind for life because I did not want him to see me fall."

Minx sighed, looking at you. "He's seems so nice, I'd hate to use him." she thought.

Unknown to you, Minx wanted to switch over to Xavier's school but she was not sure how to get her foot in the door and was searching for a way to sneak in instead. Only she found that she would not have to as an opportunity opened itself to her. Frederick, took a strong hold of your arm, causing you to yell out in pain as he nearly crushed it with his massive strength. "I remember you." he said with a smirk. "Why did you run away?"

"Oh, maybe because you kidnapped me, you jerk!" you snapped. "Let me go!"

Frederick frowned. "I don't like your tone." he said. "Maybe I should just wring you like a sponge and tell the others I accidentally sat on you."

"Get lost, Blob." said Minx, annoyed. "I was talking to Neuro."

Frederick shook his head. "Mirage wants this guy, I'm delivering him." he said. "You want to do that voodoo that you do, go ahead, make me a little girl." he scoffed. "You're most likely bluffing anyway."

With that, he started to walk away, dragging you by your hurt arm, causing Minx to turn red with anger. "Bluffing, am I?"

She waved her hand at Frederick and he quickly began to change. You watched, horrified as the flabby features of his body melted away to smooth hairless skin. His enormous belly shrank and flattened as the rest of him shrank as well. You swallowed hard, seeing his hair become a light brown before growing at an incredible rate.

"Incredible!" you thought. "Minx is really changing hi into a little girl!"

Soon, Frederick, looking more like a Fredia, was struggling to pull you along and stopped to see what was wrong. A short, feminine scream escaped her lips as she saw how huge you suddenly were to her.

"How did you get so big!?" she asked, startled.

She screamed, noticing her new voice, then looked at herself and screamed again before turning to Minx, annoyed. "What did you do to me!?!"

Without waiting for a response, she fell to her buttocks and began to cry and wail like a child having a major tantrum. "What a drams queen." said Minx, walking up to her.

"How long will he... err... she be like that?" you asked, wincing.

"Minx shrugged. "It depends upon weather of not Xavier can help me." she replied.

You looked at Minx, startled. "What do you mean?" you asked.

Minx turned to you, teary eyed. "I don't know how to undo the changes I make to reality." she replied. "Until I learn how, 'Fredia' will have to get used to being my little sister."

You sighed. "Here I thought my powers were scary." you said.

Minx sighed herself. "Will you help me?"

"You scared me." she said softly.

"I'm sorry." you said. "I had to get away from them for a while."

The girl peeked into the open door to find Scott and Jean playfully arguing, not yet aware that you had left. "What are they teasing each other about this time?" she asked.

Kat giggled again. "So you're the one who stole her heart." she said. "I'll giver her a call and let her know what's up."

Jon's wardrobe malfunction... Yeah, is it cool with you if I help him out and take him to the mall.... Great, thanks, later."

155312122122211211122212112221221.title: Kat's fashion sense.

1553121221222112111222121122212212.content:
